title: What was Lionel Richie's number one song in 1983? - Quora

response.answer_text: “All Night Long", the lead single from Lionel's sophmore solo album, Can't Slow Down, hit the Hot 100 September 17th & climbed to #1 in 8 weeks where it stayed for 4 weeks from Nov 12 - Dec 10th, when it was dethroned by “Say, Say, Say" from Paul McCartney & Michael Jackson.
